name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
notes:
- SilentPatch
- ThirteenAG's Widescreen Fix
- GInput

No CLEO because with it game crashes with "Unhandled exception".

script.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/gta-vc.exe

extract.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City/gta-vc.exe
files:
- vcpatch: https://patches-scrolls.de/download.php?g=Grand%2BTheft%2BAuto%253A%2BVice%2BCity&f=vice11.zip
- ddrawpatch: http://silent.rockstarvision.com/uploads/SilentPatchDDraw.zip
- silentpatch: http://silent.rockstarvision.com/uploads/SilentPatchVC.zip
- asiloader: https://github.com/ThirteenAG/Ultimate-ASI-Loader/releases/download/v4.47/Ultimate-ASI-Loader.zip
- ginput:
    filename: ginput.zip
    url: https://www.gtagarage.com/mods/download.php?f=39119
- widescreenfix: https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/download/gtavc/GTAVC.WidescreenFix.zip
- widescreenfrontend: https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/download/gtavc/GTAVC.WidescreenFrontend.zip
game:
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice
      City/
    file: asiloader
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice
      City/
    file: silentpatch
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice
      City/
    file: ddrawpatch
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice
      City/
    file: ginput
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice
      City/
    file: widescreenfix
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice
      City/
    file: widescreenfrontend
